pages.text: The $(thing)Locomotive$() is a type of minecart which has its own means of propulsion. A locomotive can be ridden by the player, and can push other minecarts ahead of itself.$(br2)The inventory contains 12 slots: 9 which operate the same as regular TFC chests, in that they cannot hold very large items, and 3 fuel slots for coal and charcoal.

Unlike normal minecarts, powered rails are not needed. To move, enter the locomotive and press either $(item)$(k:key.forward)$() or $(item)$(k:key.back)$().$(br2)Fuel is only consumed if the locomotive is moving, so come to a complete stop when not in use to conserve it.
First, craft a $(thing)Stirling Engine$().$(br2)(This is a non-functional block which serves only as a crafting intermediate)
Then, craft a $(thing)Locomotive$() and place it down on a rail.
